page.title: 09BERRINGTON C.E. SCHOOL
page.content: There are{2 classrooms,}a general purpose room, a toilet block, a tarmacadam playground, a playing field with a Geodome climbing frame and a garden area that was at one time part of the School House garden. The{School {House}is let to a private tenant. The school has only 26 pupils aged from 4-11 years. There are 2 teachers (Mr. Hotchkiss and Mrs.Trillo). Most of the children live in Cross Houses and come to school in car or cycle. There is{concern}that there are so few young children living in the area and that next year the school may be threatened by the prospect of closure because there will again be less than 30 children on roll.
